Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli

Class GraphicsElementsCLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.cli.GraphicsElementsCLI
  • class GraphicsElementsCLI
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates all the loadings of textures for the CLI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GraphicsElementsCLI()

      static void drawArrow​(RectangleCLI arrow, int userSelection, boolean right)
      Sets up graphics for an arrow used to iterate through cards.

      Sets up graphics for the card background.

      Sets up graphics for the picture of a God, to be inserted in a card.

      Sets up graphics for a determinate level of a building.

    • Method Detail

      • drawLevel

        public static void drawLevel​(RectangleCLI figure,
                             int level)
        Sets up graphics for a determinate level of a building.
        Parameters:
        figure - the RectangleCLI instance to set the texture on.
        level - the requested level to draw.

      • drawGod

        public static void drawGod​(RectangleCLI pic,
                           java.lang.String title)
        Sets up graphics for the picture of a God, to be inserted in a card.
        Parameters:
        pic - the RectangleCLI instance to set the texture on.
        title - the name of the god on the card.

      • drawArrow

        public static void drawArrow​(RectangleCLI arrow,
                             int userSelection,
                             boolean right)
        Sets up graphics for an arrow used to iterate through cards.
        Parameters:
        arrow - the RectangleCLI instance to set the texture on.
        userSelection - an integer representing which part of the scene the user is selecting. Based on the selection, the color changes.
        right - a flag to distinguish between right and left arrow. True if the arrow to draw is the arrow pointing right.

      • drawCard

        public static void drawCard​(RectangleCLI card)
        Sets up graphics for the card background.
        Parameters:
        card - the RectangleCLI instance to set the texture on.

      • drawNumber

        public static void drawNumber​(RectangleCLI figure,
                              int num,
                              int selection)
        Sets up graphics for a number, used in the setup phase to select the number of players.
        Parameters:
        figure - the RectangleCLI instance to set the texture on.
        num - an integer indicating which number to draw. Only "2" or "3" are allowed.
        selection - an integer representing which part of the scene the user is selecting. Based on the selection, the color changes.

      • drawWorker

        public static void drawWorker​(RectangleCLI worker,
                              char player)
        Sets up graphics for a worker to be represented on the game board.
        Parameters:
        worker - the RectangleCLI instance to set the texture on.
        player - the ID number of the player, necessary to pick the correct color for the worker.
